name: Button City: Soccer Days
storyline: Soccer mania has come to Button City! People all over town are forming teams to play in the new Open Soccer Tournament. Fennel the fox and his scrappy group of friends team up in this charming soccer adventure, with an engaging story and adorable action gameplay!
summary: Rejoin the wholesome cast of Button City as they compete in this cozy soccer adventure! Build your dream team, plan your day, bond with teammates, enjoy action-packed soccer, and win the tournament!
